cast.overview: Welcome to Hotel Transylvania, Dracula's lavish five-stake resort, where monsters and their families can live it up and no humans are allowed. One special weekend, Dracula has invited all his best friends to celebrate his beloved daughter Mavis's 118th birthday. For Dracula catering to all of these legendary monsters is no problem but the party really starts when one ordinary guy stumbles into the hotel and changes everything!
cast.title: Hotel Transylvania

details.biography: Rachel Crane, the seasoned breaking news reporter specializing in space, science, and technology, has produced multiple original CNN series. Her work explores city innovations, global problem-solving, and celebrates trailblazers in human achievement and business risk-taking. Engaging with industry titans like Jeff Bezos, Elon Musk, and Richard Branson through interviews, Rachel, a Princeton University alumna, has earned prestigious awards in space journalism, solidifying her esteemed industry position.
details.name: Rachel Crane
